stripped_text: If Forced Connection is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it. When the Runner accesses Forced Connection, trace 3 If successful, give the Runner 2 tags. Ignore this ability if the Runner accesses Forced Connection from Archives.
text:
If Forced Connection is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses Forced Connection, <trace>trace 3</trace> If successful, give the Runner 2 tags. Ignore this ability if the Runner accesses Forced Connection from Archives.
title: Forced Connection
